name: Ice World: Meltdown
description:
* I had trouble getting focus until I clicked the this grey border. Weird. *

You crash landed on a frozen planet and have been separated from your ship.

Explore your way around it until you can find the way.

Arrow keys - move and jump

[Z] - shoot water pistol

Asset Credits
